title: Slate Money: 37.8% Scammier
description:
This week, Felix Salmon and Emily Peck and Elizabeth Spiers talk about the Fed’s half point interest rate hike, big business’s dance around future abortion ban implications, and the wild west of newly, unregulated art auctions.

In the Plus segment: More overseas investors jump on board with Elon Musk.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
